entry.summary: This write-up is a bit dense, and I owe an apology in advance for the length. It is a deep dive written over many revisions after much reflection. entry.title: YouTube TV Desktop w/ adblock
entry.summary: YouTube TV Simple YouTube TV Client for desktop based on electron. You can connect a compatible device such as a phone or computer with Google Chrome and send videos to the app for viewing, just like on ChromeCast or smart TVs with YouTube. Includes ad and telemetry blocking out of the box. It implements a DIAL server (based in SSDP) to allow connection from devices that use this same proto...

entry.title: Adonalsium Adjacency matrix web visualization
entry.summary: Adonalsium is a project designed to map the intricate relationships within Brandon Sandersonâ€™s Cosmere universe. Inspired by the Network of Thrones, this project visualizes the connections between characters, locations, and events across the various books and series that make up the Cosmere. entry.title: mtgscan.cards: Fullstack MTG card scanning app

link.title: mtgscan.cards: Fullstack MTG card scanning app

entry.summary: mtgscan.cards is a simple full-stack MTG card scanning website for desktop and mobile. Stack Frontend: Vite + React Backend: Flask (modular, JWT-auth) Database: PostgreSQL (via pg_pool) Deployment: Docker Compose, Gunicorn, Static site hosting CI/CD: GitHub Actions + self-hosted runner Setup 1.
